Its owner later adopted another Shiba Inu called Neiro which caused a long blockchain civil war with multiple tokens battling it out for liquidity. Now a month later SlumDOGE, the man who became a millionaire off Dogecoin (but never sold), explains why Neiro is a moment for the dog coin community to unite.

articles.description:
September is shaping up to be a critical month for the cryptocurrency market, with top coins like Solana (SOL), Cardano (ADA), and GoodEgg (GEGG) showing great potential for gains. These three cryptocurrencies are positioned uniquely in the market, with strong fundamentals, innovative platforms, and growing user bases. Whether you’re a seasoned investor or a newcomer to the crypto space, these coins are worth considering as part of your portfolio this month.
 
Solana (SOL): A Bullish Rebound Amid Whale Accumulation 
Solana (SOL) continues to gain attention in the cryptocurrency world, especially as whale investors accumulate more of the token. Recently, Solana (SOL) has rebounded from a key support level of $122, showing signs of a potential bullish breakout. Whale investors have purchased…

BNB has shown promising signs of recovery, breaking through its descending trendline over the weekend. This breakout came after weeks of downward pressure since the cryptocurrency hit a high of $600 on August 23. Despite this rally, concerns are growing about whether BNB can maintain its upward momentum and why community me…

Despite this surge, BNB fell 2.74% over the past week, highlighting the ongoing volatility in the crypto market. However, BNB’s market capitalization grew by 2.02% to $73.47 billion, signaling underlying strength.

articles.description:
Investors in Solana (SOL) are now exploring new opportunities, including the innovative GoodEgg (GEGG) project. While Solana (SOL) has long been a favorite among developers and investors due to its scalable architecture, the rise of GoodEgg (GEGG)—a hybrid meme coin with a social scoring system—has caught the attention of the market, drawing some Solana (SOL) investors towards this emerging contender.
 
Solana (SOL) On-Chain Activity Sees Key Growth 
Despite the current buzz around new projects like GoodEgg (GEGG), Solana (SOL) remains a powerhouse in the altcoin market. Recent on-chain data indicates that Solana (SOL) has seen significant growth in its daily active addresses, which tripled to 3.11 million users over the past month. Additionally, the number of new wallet addresses in the f…

articles.author: Damian Chmiel
articles.description:
Cryptocurrency  
exchange Bitget has ramped up its regulatory compliance efforts with the recent  
appointment of Hon Ng as its new Chief Legal Officer. Ng, who previously held a  
similar role at industry giant Binance, brings a wealth of experience in  
navigating the complex regulatory landscape of digital assets.
In an  
exclusive interview with Finance Magnates, Ng outlined his vision for enhancing  
crypto compliance strategies while fostering innovation in the rapidly evolving  
digital asset space. He emphasized the importance of balancing regulatory  
requirements with technological advancement.
Compliance Doesn't Have to Be the Enemy of Crypto  
Innovation
Hon Ng's  
career trajectory is nothing short of remarkable. As a seasoned legal  
professional with over two decades of expe…

It is important to note that the ratio of realized profit and loss to market size is determined by the Bitcoin Sell-Side Risk Ratio. …

articles.author: Vivek Sen
articles.description:
The Bitcoin mining difficulty reached a new all-time high of 92.67 trillion on September 11. This represents a 3.04% increase over the last 24 hours and continues an upward trajectory in mining competition.

JUST IN: #Bitcoin mining difficulty hit a NEW ALL-TIME HIGH 🚀 pic.twitter.com/vhq0ClEXRW
— Bitcoin Magazine (@BitcoinMagazine) September 11, 2024
  
  
  
The Bitcoin difficulty chart plots the historical increases and decreases in mining difficulty over time. It measures how hard it is for miners to find a valid hash for the next block. Higher difficulty requires more computing power to mine new Bitcoin.
When combined with the Bitcoin price, difficulty helps determine miners' profitability and return on investment. The metric soared in 2024 amid massive growth in Bitcoin's overall hash rate and adoption.
The rising difficulty shows intensifying competition on the Bitcoin network as more miners fight for limited block rewards. This is generally constructive for network security and decentralization.
Despite rough market conditions this year, the difficulty increase displays the unprecedented demand for Bitcoin block rewards. It underlines the incredible security offered by the collective computing power of miners around the world.
The difficulty adjustment algorithm built into Bitcoin's code dictates the pace of change in mining competition. It is programmed to find blocks approximately every 10 minutes, maintaining a steady influx of new Bitcoin over time.
This predictable Bitcoin issuance schedule makes its inflation rate easy to model and appeals to investors compared to fiat currencies subject to central bank policies.
articles.title: Bitcoin Mining Difficulty Hits Record 92 Trillion
